channel.title: [PI]How do i change name of client without gui?
channel.description: I have a PI client and i was wondering how do i change the name of the client into my server name for example like if i was trying to change the title of soulsplit client into my server's client how would i do that if it doesn't have GUI? I've tried Client.Java and i still don't see how to change client name. Help please.
